id.description: A unique integer value identifying this custom link.

link_text.description: Jinja2 template code for link text

link_url.description: Jinja2 template code for link URL

group_name.description: Links with the same group will appear as a dropdown menu

button_class.description:
The class of the first link in a group will be used for the dropdown button

* `default` - Default
* `blue` - Blue
* `indigo` - Indigo
* `purple` - Purple
* `pink` - Pink
* `red` - Red
* `orange` - Orange
* `yellow` - Yellow
* `green` - Green
* `teal` - Teal
* `cyan` - Cyan
* `gray` - Gray
* `black` - Black
* `white` - White
* `ghost-dark` - Link

new_window.description: Force link to open in a new window
